column4: in terminal type     modinfo snd_via82xx  see line like this?   dxs_support:Support for DXS channels (0 = auto, 1 = enable, 2 = disable, 3 = 48k only, 4 = no VRA, 5 = enable any sample rate) (int)
right click Volume icon on top panel choose  Open Vol Control then preferences and enable via dxs. i have  4 entries maybe try all or some and see if that helps
